channel.title: Cybersecurity News Aggregator
channel.description: Latest cybersecurity news from top sources
channel.comment: News aggregated from: Krebs on Security, The Hacker News, Threatpost, Bleeping Computer, Dark Reading

item.title: OpenAI's ChatGPT ads will allegedly prioritize sponsored content in answers

item.title: New MongoDB Flaw Lets Unauthenticated Attackers Read Uninitialized Memory
item.description: A high-severity security flaw has been disclosed in MongoDB that could allow unauthenticated users to read uninitialized heap memory. The vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2025-14847 (CVSS score: 8.7), ha...
item.dc:creator: The Hacker News

item.title: Fake Grubhub emails promise tenfold return on sent cryptocurrency
